skill.name: lead-research-assistant
skill.description: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for target companies, and providing actionable contact strategies. Perfect for sales, business development, and marketing professionals.
skill.summary: Identifies high-quality leads for your product or service by analyzing your business, searching for ...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution. The skill provides behavioral guidance to the AI for lead research tasks.

content.user_title: Find qualified leads for your business
content.value_statement: Identifying the right prospects takes hours of manual research. This skill analyzes your product, finds matching companies based on industry and size, and provides prioritized leads with contact strategies ready for outreach.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes your product or service to understand value proposition
Identifies target companies matching your ideal customer profile
Ranks leads by priority score based on fit and need signals
Suggests decision-maker roles and personalized contact strategies
Finds LinkedIn URLs and conversation starters for outreach
Formats results for easy CRM import and follow-up
limitations: Does not access external databases or paid lead services
Cannot verify if contact information is current or valid
Cannot directly send emails or connect to CRM systems

use_cases.title: Build targeted prospect lists
use_cases.description: Quickly generate qualified lead lists with contact context before outreach campaigns.

use_cases.title: Find first customers
use_cases.description: Identify early adopters who match your product and need solutions like yours.

use_cases.title: Research target accounts
use_cases.description: Prepare account-based marketing strategies with company-specific value propositions.

prompt_templates.title: Quick lead search
prompt_templates.prompt: I'm building a [product description]. Find me 10 companies in [location/industry] that would be good leads.

prompt_templates.title: From codebase
prompt_templates.prompt: Look at what I'm building in this repository and identify the top 10 companies in [location] that would benefit.

prompt_templates.title: Detailed ICP research
prompt_templates.prompt: My product: [description]. Target: [industry], [size], [location], pain points: [points]. Find 20 qualified leads.

prompt_templates.title: Competitive analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: My product competes with [competitor]. Find companies using them and explain why they should switch to us.

best_practices: Provide specific details about your ideal customer including industry, company size, and pain points.
Run the skill from your product's codebase for automatic context analysis.
Request follow-up research on top 3 leads for deeper insights before outreach.
Save results to CSV format for easy import into your CRM system.
anti_patterns: Asking for leads without defining your target market or value proposition.
Skipping the follow-up research step on high-priority leads.
Using generic messaging without incorporating the suggested conversation starters.
Expecting verified contact information without manual verification.

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Claude versions?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude Code and the main Claude interface. It requires Claude's web search capability to find current company information.

faq.question: How many leads can I research at once?
faq.answer: The skill can handle requests for 10-50 leads per query. For larger lists, break into multiple requests with different filters.

faq.question: Does this connect to my CRM?
faq.answer: No, this skill generates research and suggestions. It can format output as CSV for manual CRM import.

faq.question: Is my product information kept private?
faq.answer: Yes, your product details and research queries stay within your Claude conversation and are not shared externally.

faq.question: Why are some leads missing contact emails?
faq.answer: The skill focuses on finding companies and suggesting approaches. Contact emails require verification tools not included in this skill.

faq.question: How does this differ from paid lead generation tools?
faq.answer: This skill uses reasoning and web search rather than databases. It provides strategic context that static data cannot match.
